languages.text: {n}Маражай, развалившийся в кресле, взирает на вас поверх зажженной свечи, над которой он держит, слегка поигрывая, узкий друкарский клинок. Его голос источает отравленный мед.{/n} "{name}. Я ждал тебя".

{n}Lounging on a chair, Marazhai lightly waves a narrow Drukhari blade back and forth over a lit candle. His eyes meet yours over the flame, his voice dripping into your ears like poisoned honey:{/n} "{name}. I have been waiting for you."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай, развалившийся в кресле, взирает на вас поверх зажженной свечи, над которой он держит, слегка поигрывая, узкий друкарский клинок. Его голос источает отравленный мед.{/n} "{name}. Я ждал тебя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Lounging on a chair, Marazhai lightly waves a narrow Drukhari blade back and forth over a lit candle. His eyes meet yours over the flame, his voice dripping into your ears like poisoned honey:{/n} "{name}. I have been waiting for you."

{n}Lounging on a chair, Marazhai lightly waves a narrow Drukhari blade back and forth over a lit candle. His eyes meet yours over the flame, his voice dripping into your ears like poisoned honey:{/n} "{name}. I have been waiting for you."

{n}Lounging on a chair, Marazhai lightly waves a narrow Drukhari blade back and forth over a lit candle. His eyes meet yours over the flame, his voice dripping into your ears like poisoned honey:{/n} "{name}. I have been waiting for you."

{n}Lounging on a chair, Marazhai lightly waves a narrow Drukhari blade back and forth over a lit candle. His eyes meet yours over the flame, his voice dripping into your ears like poisoned honey:{/n} "{name}. I have been waiting for you."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋懒洋洋地躺在椅子里，就着烛光把玩着一把狭长的黑暗灵族战刀。在摇曳的火光中，他对上你的目光，声音仿佛搀着毒液的蜂蜜一样，滴落在你的耳中。{/n}“{name}，我一直在等你。”
languages.original_text: {n}Lounging on a chair, Marazhai lightly waves a narrow Drukhari blade back and forth over a lit candle. His eyes meet yours over the flame, his voice dripping into your ears like poisoned honey:{/n} "{name}. I have been waiting for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋懒洋洋地躺在椅子里，就着烛光把玩着一把狭长的黑暗灵族战刀在摇曳的火光中，他对上你的目光，声音仿佛搀着毒液的蜂蜜一样，滴落在你的耳中。{/n}“{name}，我一直在等你。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai está reclinado perezosamente en una silla, calentando la fina hoja de un puñal drukhari sobre una vela encendida. Vuestras miradas se cruzan por encima de la llama, y su voz se desliza por tus oídos como gotas de miel envenenada:{/n} «{name}. Te estaba esperando».
languages.original_text: {n}Lounging on a chair, Marazhai lightly waves a narrow Drukhari blade back and forth over a lit candle. His eyes meet yours over the flame, his voice dripping into your ears like poisoned honey:{/n} "{name}. I have been waiting for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai está reclinado perezosamente en una silla, calentando la fina hoja de un puñal drukhari sobre una vela encendida. Vuestras miradas se cruzan por encima de la llama, y su voz se desliza por tus oídos como gotas de miel envenenada:{/n} «{name}. Te estaba esperando».

languages.text: {n}Confortablement installé dans un fauteuil, Marazhai passe lentement une étroite lame drukhari au-dessus d'une bougie allumée. Son regard croise le vôtre au-dessus de la flamme et sa voix vous enveloppe comme du miel empoisonné.{/n} « {name}. Je vous attendais. »
languages.original_text: {n}Lounging on a chair, Marazhai lightly waves a narrow Drukhari blade back and forth over a lit candle. His eyes meet yours over the flame, his voice dripping into your ears like poisoned honey:{/n} "{name}. I have been waiting for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Confortablement installé dans un fauteuil, Marazhai passe lentement une étroite lame drukhari au-dessus d'une bougie allumée. Son regard croise le vôtre au-dessus de la flamme et sa voix vous enveloppe comme du miel empoisonné.{/n} « {name}. Je vous attendais. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sitzt auf einem Stuhl und schwingt eine schmale Drukhari-Klinge über einer brennenden Kerze leicht hin und her. Eure Blicke treffen sich über der Flamme, seine Stimme tropft in deine Ohren wie vergifteter Honig:{/n} "{name}. Ich habe auf Euch gewartet."
languages.original_text: {n}Lounging on a chair, Marazhai lightly waves a narrow Drukhari blade back and forth over a lit candle. His eyes meet yours over the flame, his voice dripping into your ears like poisoned honey:{/n} "{name}. I have been waiting for you."

traits.locale_text: Marazhai sitzt auf einem Stuhl und schwingt eine schmale Drukhari-Klinge über einer brennenden Kerze leicht hin und her. Eure Blicke treffen sich über der Flamme, seine Stimme tropft in deine Ohren wie vergifteter Honig:{/n} "{name}. Ich habe auf Euch gewartet."

languages.text: {n}椅子に腰掛けたマラズハイは、火のついた蝋燭のうえで、細身のデュカーリ・ブレードを軽く振る。炎越しに目が合えば、その声が毒入りの蜂蜜の如くあなたの耳に響く{/n}「{name}、お前を待ってたんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Lounging on a chair, Marazhai lightly waves a narrow Drukhari blade back and forth over a lit candle. His eyes meet yours over the flame, his voice dripping into your ears like poisoned honey:{/n} "{name}. I have been waiting for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}椅子に腰掛けたマラズハイは、火のついた蝋燭のうえで、細身のデュカーリ・ブレードを軽く振る。炎越しに目が合えば、その声が毒入りの蜂蜜の如くあなたの耳に響く{/n}「{name}、お前を待ってたんだ」

languages.text: {n}Bir sandalyeye yayılan Marazhai, ince bir Drukhari bıçağını yanan bir mumun üzerinde hafifçe ileri geri savuruyor. Alevin üzerinde göz göze geliyorsunuz. Sesi, kulaklarına zehirli bal gibi damlıyor.{/n} "{name}. Seni bekliyordum."
languages.original_text: {n}Lounging on a chair, Marazhai lightly waves a narrow Drukhari blade back and forth over a lit candle. His eyes meet yours over the flame, his voice dripping into your ears like poisoned honey:{/n} "{name}. I have been waiting for you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir sandalyeye yayılan Marazhai, ince bir Drukhari bıçağını yanan bir mumun üzerinde hafifçe ileri geri savuruyor. Alevin üzerinde göz göze geliyorsunuz. Sesi, kulaklarına zehirli bal gibi damlıyor.{/n} "{name}. Seni bekliyordum."
